name: Syed Anwar
roleDescription: I enjoy exploring various aspects of web development and continuously learning about advanced technologies like AI and Cyber Security. In my free time, I like to play games.
aboutme: Greetings! I am Syed Anwar, a proficient developer with extensive expertise in JavaScript, ReactJS, and Node/ExpressJS. Moreover, I'm passionate about building softwares and functional web applications. I take pride in developing scalable and efficient code that adheres to industry standards and best practices. Besides my tech pursuits, I enjoy playing sports and believe in maintaining a healthy body and mind. I'm eager to work on challenging projects and collaborate with talented individuals. Let's connect!

work.Achievements: As a freelance web developer, I have worked with numerous local and international clients, and also on Fiverr. My tech stack mainly includes JavaScript, jQuery, Node/Express.js, and React.js. I have developed custom web applications, responsive websites, and also worked on integrating payment gateways and API integrations. During my time as a freelance web developer, I have gained expertise in both front-end and back-end web development. I have also demonstrated proficiency in database management, deployment, and server-side scripting. My clients have appreciated my communication skills, timely delivery, and commitment to providing high-quality work.

As a Web Developer at the Pixlium Devs, I actively contributed to the design, development, and maintenance of various web applications and software projects. Leveraging my expertise in technologies such as React, Node.js, Express.js, and other web technologies, I participated in the entire development lifecycle, from requirement analysis and technical design to implementation and deployment. I collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of front-end and back-end components, and regularly engaged in code reviews and testing to deliver high-quality, bug-free solutions. Additionally, I played a key role in optimizing application performance, troubleshooting issues, and implementing security measures to safeguard data and ensure a smooth user experience.

portfolio.name: Bizroutes
portfolio.description: Developed AI based scraper for this site which fetch different route information using nodejs, chatgpt.

portfolio.name: The Green Heights
portfolio.description: Developed this website for my client who is the owner of greenheights.

portfolio.description: Menulist is web application for fast food.

portfolio.name: Blue logoon
portfolio.description: This a theme provided by client which i was responsible for customizing according to client needs have worked on different frontend features.

portfolio.name: Swat Hamsafars Travel Agency
portfolio.description: Swat Hamsafars are tour operators which offer travel packages, destinations, and booking options. Site functionalities include Destination Listings, Package Details, Booking System, User Accounts, Payment Integration, Customer Reviews, Blog.

testimonials.description: I am extremely impressed with the work done by Syed Anwar. He was able to turn our ideas into a fully functional and visually stunning website. He was easy to work with and always made themselves available to answer any questions we had. I highly recommend Syed Anwar to anyone in need of a skilled and professional web developer.
testimonials.name: Engr Mujahid Hussein

testimonials.description: Working with Syed Anwar was a good experience. From start to finish, He provided excellent Services and delivered exactly what we needed for our website.
testimonials.name: Asif Khan

testimonials.description: We are extremely pleased with the outcome and would highly recommend Syed Anwar Khan for any web development projects. His skills, professionalism, and dedication made a significant positive impact on our project. He needs a little bit work on his communication apart from that overall experience was good.
testimonials.name: Taro Yamada
